page.title: 12POLITICS IN BRYNNA 1985.
page.content: Leader of Conserative Government {Mrs M.Thatcher. Welsh Officer Of Central Government {Ray Powell M.P. Mid Glamorgan County Council {CLLR Gerrry Waters Taff Ely Borough Council {CLLR Tony Hughes Llanharan Community Council { } {Brynnau Ward Members (WHO ARE) {T.Hughes,C .Parker,R.Potter,I.Gylee, {A.Gylee,S.Clancey. There is only one Pressure Group in Brynnau and that is the Anti-Opencast .They are against the opencast mining being extended around the village. The noise of the blasting is bad enough already. There is a lot of dust as well as noise which settles on the houses. By {Susan Hughes , { Age 10
